value.title: Controlling cost with Azure Synapse Serverless Pools
value.excerpt: Curious how to save cost when using Azure Synapse Serverless Pools? Any way to minimize the amount of data you are processing? Patrick shows you how and has a script for you!  Cost management for serverless SQL pool in Azure Synapse Analytics https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/data-processed
